title: How can I fix a device that has been corrupted?
content:
I bought a google pixel 4a a few days ago and it was working fine but suddenly I can't acces it. It displays a message saying "Your device is corrupt, it can't be trusted and may not work properly". After looking into it I found out that I could fix it by going into the recovery mode and doing a factory reset but when I try doing that it doesn't work either. This is what it displays:
Wiping data...
E: open failed: /metadata/ota: No such file or directory 
Formatting /data...
Formatting/ metadata...
Wiping Titan M...
E: can't send spi message: try again. It displays this over 20 times and then it says "Data wipe complete"
So I can't solve it by doing a factory reset. Is there anyway I can fix this? I would appreciate some advice.
